rpgonline

Class TextureMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • rpgonline.TextureMap

  • public class TextureMap
extends java.lang.Object

    A class for storing texture data.

    Any call to load textures that use an already mapped ID will replace that mapped ID. Overall, this class acts as a map of Image objects..

    Author:
    Tomas

      • loadTexture

        public static void loadTexture(java.lang.String s,
                               java.net.URL loc)
                        throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Loads a texture then binds it to a texture ID.
        Parameters:
        s - The texture ID to bind to.
        loc - A URL pointing to a .png image.
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException - If an error occurs loading an image.

      • addSpriteMap

        public static void addSpriteMap(java.lang.String s,
                                org.newdawn.slick.Image img,
                                int tw,
                                int th)

        Adds an image as a sprite map.

        The textures are bounds as s + "." + i where i is the index in the sprite map starting at the top left corner and travelling horizontally.

        Parameters:
        s - The prefix of the texture ID to bind to.
        img - The image holding the sprite map.
        tw - The width of one sprite.
        th - The height of one sprite.

      • loadSpriteMap

        public static void loadSpriteMap(java.lang.String s,
                                 java.net.URL loc,
                                 int tw,
                                 int th)
                          throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException

        Loads a texture then adds it as a sprite map.

        The textures are bounds as s + "." + i where i is the index in the sprite map starting at the top left corner and travelling horizontally.

        Parameters:
        s - The prefix of the texture ID to bind to.
        loc - A URL pointing to a .png image.
        tw - The width of one sprite.
        th - The height of one sprite.
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException - if an error occurs loading the sprite map.
